{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter LITE.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Ubiquiti EdgeRouter Lite ERlite-3 Desktop Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = EdgeRouter |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Lite |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = ERLite-3 |page_start_date = 08/13/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Ubiquiti_Networks_EdgeRouter_LITE |series = EdgeRouter |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN5020; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS64 |cpu1_type_rev = OCTEON Plus |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 300 / 400 / 500 / 600 / 700 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV320ETTI-70G; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25X05CL; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG8JB-25; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |eth2chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |eth3chip = Atheros;AR8035-A; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.1;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.32.13-UBNT;EdgeOS;based on Vyatta Core/Debian 6.06;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, RJ-45,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 14 pin,, unpopulated,, J1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC125A;;2;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;2;,,, 2A Schottky Barrier Rectifier;Diodes Inc;B260/A;;2;,,, 1MHz, 2A Synchronous Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi;uP1713;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = ubnt |defaultpass = ubnt |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U78Z025T |manuf_rev = .00 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/2013 |estprice = 99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00HXT8EKE |asin_country = US |asin2 = B00CPRVF5K |asin_country2 = US |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The board shown seems to indicate [[Foxconn]] manuf. (U78Z025T00)
{{seealso|Ubiquiti Networks EdgeRouter Series}}
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.ubnt.com/downloads/datasheets/edgemax/EdgeRouter_DS.pdf Datasheet] :[http://www.ubnt.com/downloads/guides/edgemax/EdgeOS_UG.pdf User's Guide] :[http://www.ubnt.com/downloads/firmwares/XN-fw/v5.5.6/GPL.UBNT.v5.5.6.tar.bz2 GPL Firmware Source]
*[http://wiki.ubnt.com/EdgeMAX_Wiki Ubiquiti Networks Wiki]
===Reviews=== *[https://www.insidegadgets.com/2015/06/10/inside-the-ubiquiti-edgerouter-lite-router-dated-2013/ ''Teardown'' on '''InsideGadgets'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/32012-first-look-ubiquiti-edgerouter-lite ''First Look'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :'''CPU''': [[Cavium]] ''Octeon Plus'' CN5020 @500MHz 2-cores :'''Eth''': 3x [[Atheros]] AR8035-A GbE PHY's :'''Flash''': On-board 4MB Flash :'''Storage''':Internal 3.8GB USB Flash :::(''Kingston'' ID) drive with 1.5 GB free for use occupies single internal USB port.
===Reg. third party FW support=== *[http://rtfm.net/FreeBSD/ERL/ ''FreeBSD 10.0 on Ubiquiti EdgeRouter Lite'' @ '''rtfm.net'''] *[http://www.daemonology.net/blog/2016-01-10-FreeBSD-EdgeRouter-Lite.html ''FreeBSD on EdgeRouter Lite'' @ '''daemonology.net'''] *[https://forum.pfsense.org/index.php?topic=63926.0 ''Ubiquiti edgerouter lite support?'' @ '''pfSense''' forums]
